an2.311-319:1: "Bhikkhus, for full understanding of lust … for the utter destruction of lust … for the abandoning of lust … for the destruction of lust … for the vanishing of lust … for the fading away of lust … for the cessation of lust … for the giving up of lust … for the relinquishment of lust, these two things are to be developed. What two? Serenity and insight. For the relinquishment of lust, these two things are to be developed."
